itemDisplayName: Single VM SAP HANA Express Instance
description: This template deploys a SuSE-based virtual machine and installs SAP HANA Express with all required dependencies in it. For using this template, you first need to download the SAP HANA Express Setup Packages from SAP (https://www.sap.com/developer/topics/sap-hana-express.html). After that, the quick start template helps you with uploading the SAP HANA Express Setup Packages to an Azure Storage Account from which the Template Deployment will pick it up for the automated setup of HANA Express inside of provisioned Azure Virtual Machines.
summary: Creates a Virtual Machine and deploys SAP HANA Express with all dependencies into the VM. To use this quick-start, you need to download SAP HANA Express packages from SAP.
